title: Restores the tuition freeze for charter schools to the 2008-2009 school year level for the City School District of the city of Albany
summary: Restores the tuition freeze for charter schools to the 2008-2009 school year level for the City School District of the city of Albany.

   39  ter entity set forth in the charter.  Payments  made  pursuant  to  this
   40  subdivision  shall  be  made by the school district in six substantially
   41  equal installments each year beginning on the first business day of July
   42  and every two months thereafter. Amounts payable under this  subdivision
   43  shall  be  determined  by the commissioner. Amounts payable to a charter
   44  school in its first year of operation shall be based on the  projections

   46  shall be reconciled with  the  actual  enrollment  at  the  end  of  the
   47  school's first year of operation, and any necessary adjustments shall be
   48  made to payments during the school's second year of operation.
